overview: Oz’s vast experience in management and leadership is a result of 12 years in the Israeli Air Force as commander and officer. Oz begun his design career specializing in 3D and product design, and later focused on user experience & interaction design. Serving as the Director of User Experience design & Innovation at MRM Worldwide in NYC (part of McCann Worldgroup), Oz led and developed strategic platforms, mobile and online applications, and web experiences for many of the world’s biggest companies and corporations (US Army, Exxon, Verizon, Nikon, MasterCard, Ikea, etc.)
